flawed_nl_solution:
In four years, Hans will be 8+4=<<8+4=13>>13 years old.
Then Annika will be 13*3=<<13*3=39>>39 years old.
So Annika right now is 39-4=<<39-4=35>>35 years old.
#### 35

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 13. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
